Generate Title Mapping for Plot Labels (Internal)

Source: R/utils.R
dot-get_title_mapping.Rd

Determines appropriate title names for plotting based on available columns in the dataset. If a Description column exists and description_as_title is TRUE, it uses Description as titles. Otherwise, it checks for PlotTitle or falls back to using Variable names.

Usage

.get_title_mapping(data, description_as_title = TRUE)

Arguments

data

A data frame or a list of data frames containing the dataset.

description_as_title

Logical. If TRUE, prioritizes the Description column for titles. If FALSE, using Variable as title name.

Value

A named vector where variable names map to their corresponding titles.

On this page
